body: Electrolyse a phosphate buffer solution \(70 ml, c = 0.2 M, pH 2.0) containing acid orange 7 \(0.25 mmol) and arylsulfinic acid \(1a-1c) \(0.25 mmol)  in an undivided cell under constant current conditions for 2.5 h at 0.32 mA cm<sup>-1</sup>.
At the end of electrolysis, place he cell in a refrigerator overnight.
Collect the precipitated solid by filtration and wash several times with water.
After recrystallization in ethyl ether, characterize the products by IR, <sup>1</sup>H NMR, <sup>13</sup>C NMR and mass spectroscopy.
